contraindications.disease: The 50 lethal dose for TTO in a rat model is 1 9 to 2 6 mL kg and doses 1 5 g kg was associated with ataxia and lethargy Dermal patches containing 10 of tea tree oil was not associated with any irritant reactions Topically applied tea tree oil rarely causes systemic toxicity A32439 Dermal application of approximately 120 ml of undiluted tea tree oil to three cats with shaved but intact skin resulted in symptoms of hypothermia uncoordination dehydration and trembling and in the death of one of the cats A32439
